ingredients: 2 cups uncooked Barilla Pronto Rotini Pasta
2 cups Barilla All Natural Spicy Marinara
2 cups (or desired amount) Tyson Grilled & Ready Chicken Strips*
1 cup corn kernels, frozen, canned or roasted
½ cup shredded light Mexican-blend grated cheese
1 avocado, halved, seeded, peeled and diced
Optional garnish; sliced black olives, fresh cilantro leaves and additional sliced green onion
Optional garnish; sliced black olives, fresh cilantro leaves and additional sliced green onion
